name: eggd_hydra_v0.0.3
title: eggd_hydra_v0.0.3
summary: Predicts the possible presence of KMT2A-PTDs using exon coverage
description: Based on exon-level coverage data generated by eggd_athena, calculates two distinct coverage ratios using specific exons and compares these to predetermined thresholds. Predicts the presence or absence of KMT2A-PTDs based on whether or not both thresholds are met.

inputSpec.name: exon_stats
inputSpec.label: Exon statistics file
inputSpec.help: Exon-level coverage file generated by Athena
